definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
(of a woman) to dress as a man (idiom)

sentences.english: In Milan his spectacular shows immediately become the must-see appointment during the men's fashion week.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他的時裝秀成爲男裝時裝週中不可錯過的品牌。

sentences.english: She disguised herself as a man by a false beard.
sentences.chinese: 她戴上假鬍子女扮男裝。

sentences.english: Th is young judge was really Port ia dressed as a man.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，這位年輕的法官就是女扮男裝的波西亞。

sentences.english: Her husband recently spent several hundred pounds on menswear here.
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫最近在男裝部花了幾百鎊錢買衣服。

sentences.english: China Lilang is one of the leading menswear brands in China.
sentences.chinese: 利郎是國內領先的男裝品牌公司之一。

sentences.english: In 1995, Dayang launched its own flagship brand of Trands menswear.
sentences.chinese: 1995年，大楊推出了自有旗艦品牌“創世”男裝。

sentences.english: Clove learned that case is not trust, disguised as men returned to the town of rock.
sentences.chinese: 丁香得知情況卻不放心，女扮男裝回到了磐石鎮。

sentences.english: It’s been said that Einar was often mistaken for a woman wearing man’s clothing.
sentences.chinese: 據說艾娜儘管身穿男裝卻常常被誤認爲是女性。

sentences.english: Our revenue for menswear has tripled since we launched the new site.
sentences.chinese: 自從起用了新網站，我們的男裝收入已經翻了三番。

sentences.english: Other figures in the temple include four eunuchs and a few female servants in men's clothes.
sentences.chinese: 殿內的彩塑侍從人物，有四名宦官及幾名男裝侍女。

sentences.english: Durable men's and women's clothing are always popular.
sentences.chinese: 再比如耐穿性，耐穿的男裝和女裝也一直大受歡迎。

sentences.english: The famous brand of men's suit in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國著名西裝品牌，柒牌男裝。

sentences.english: This pope he claimed was a woman disguised as a man.
sentences.chinese: 他稱，這是一位女扮男裝的教皇。

sentences.english: Some women who value well-made clothing have even resorted to shopping in menswear departments.
sentences.chinese: 有些注重服裝品質的女士只好轉戰男裝部購買衣服。

definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
